thread.title: What's happened to Rita Ora's face? The singer pictured looking unrecognisable at pre-Grammy party
thread.title_full: What's happened to Rita Ora's face? The singer pictured looking unrecognisable at pre-Grammy party

author: Lucy Buckland
title: What's happened to Rita Ora's face? The singer pictured looking unrecognisable at pre-Grammy party
text:
Pop vixen Rita Ora appears to have undergone a huge transformation. 
The former X-Factor judge showed off her bizarre new look at the annual Clive Davis pre- Grammy party on Saturday night. 
Hitting the red carpet in Los Angeles, Rita flaunted her curves in a backless black jumpsuit, slashed to show a hint of skin, with her trademark blonde locks left loose. 
But all eyes were on the singer's face - which was virtually unrecognisable. RIP singer Rita Ora smoulders on the red carpet as she parties at pre-Grammy bash in LA - but the change in her face was what really got fans talking (Photo: Splash News) The TV judge's face appears to have undergone quite the transformation since she appeared on the music scene in 2012 (Photo: Getty) Read More Rita Ora looks unrecognisable as she steps out with bizarre new look: 'What's she done to her face?' 
It could be that 26-year-old Rita - who is known for her daring sense of style - is experimenting with a new make-up technique. 
The America's Next Top Model judge's face appeared tauter face than usual, which was only exaggerated by a sweep of highlighter on each cheek. 
Rita's radically different appearance could be down to clever contouring - although her followers were quick to suggest it could be something more. Rita pouted her nude lips for the cameras at the exclusive LA bash (Photo: Splash News) Rita Ora (Photo: REUTERS) (Photo: Rex) 
Her bemused fans took to social media to speculate on the singer's new look. 
"OK what the hell happened to Rita's Ora face?" asked one. With another asking the star: "No hate but have you had something done to your face your latest Instagram pics just look different." The curvy singer's frayed black jumpsuit showed a flash of thigh, but did little to distract from Rita's changing face (Photo: Splash News) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
